title: Kids' Picks: Elmer Fudd
brief_description: A series of children’s classic cartoon characters from the studios of Warner Brothers and MGM. 1. “Cobweb Hotel” featuring a sinister singing spider and newlywed flies. 2. “An Itch in Time” featuring Elmer Fudd. 3. “Falling Hare” featuring Bugs Bunny. 4. “Bars and Stripes Forever”. 5. “Doggone Tired”. 6. “Chicken a la King”. 7. “The Sheepish Wolf”. Rated: G
